column4: well, this chan is a royal waste of time. one more time: anybody around who knows boot sequence by grub and mounting root file system during boot?
cmon, kernel dudes, nobody is around?
#ubuntu-kernel, but keep in mind it's a devel channel.
thanx, i wouldn't want to go talk to kernel dudes on that chan. they are prolly arrogant as hell and i am a kernel level myself :(
